name: Computing Scoring
description: Scoring template for Computing super-sector patents. Includes performance impact and resource efficiency metrics.

questions.question: Rate the potential performance improvement this technology offers. Consider processing speed, throughput, response time, and computational efficiency.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe the performance benefits and how they are achieved.

questions.question: How efficiently does this technology use computing resources? Consider CPU utilization, memory management, power consumption, and thermal efficiency.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify resource efficiency improvements and tradeoffs.

questions.question: How relevant is this patent to virtualization, containerization, or cloud computing technologies?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Describe applicability to VMs, containers, or cloud infrastructure.
